General.Name: Kaizen Discovery
General.Description: Kaizen Discovery Inc. engages in the exploration of mineral projects in Peru and Canada. It holds interest in the Pinaya Copper-Gold Project that covers an area of 101 square kilometers and includes 10 kilometers of underexplored strike length within the Andahuaylas-Yauri Porphyry Belt in southeastern Peru. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada. Kaizen Discovery Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Ivanhoe Electric (BVI) Inc.
General.Address: World Trade Centre, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E1
